item.title: Leetcode 1721
item.description: 1721. Swapping Nodes in a Linked List The idea of this solution is pretty simple. First, we find the length of the linked list Next, we iterate through the linked list up until the ending kth node And then we iterate through the linked list to to kth node Then, last of all, switch the value of the kth node with the value of the kth node from the end.
